eu_initiatives: Financial, banking industry: The HCJP publishes its report on a public website (http://hcjp.fr/); its studies focuses on legal aspects and aims to present issues and solutions as objectively as possible. The HCJP is interested in every aspects of the European regulation of the banking and financial activities, particularly how the current European regulation will be impacted by Brexit.
organisation_name: Haut Comité Juridique de la Place Financière de Paris (HCJP)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: Reports and opinions published on our website
goals__remit: To analyse legal issues relating to French and European legal financial system
